DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess effect multiple dose isavuconazole pharmacokinetics ( PK ) warfarin single dose administration .
DOC.brief_title: Drug Interaction Study Isavuconazole Warfarin Healthy Male Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects receive single dose warfarin Day 1 follow 15 day wash-out period ( time warfarin dose isavuconazole dosing ) . On Days 16 17 , isavuconazole dose three time daily ( TID ) . TID dose administer 8 hour apart . On Days 18 28 , isavuconazole administer daily ( QD ) . All subject administer single dose warfarin Day 20 . A follow visit occur approximately 7 day last dose isavuconazole . Blood sample pharmacokinetics collect throughout study .
